actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Forests and Public Land Management

official_title: A bill to relinquish any interest that the United States may have in certain land that was subject to a right-of-way that was granted to the predecessor of the Chicago and Northwestern Transportation Company, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Relinquishes and conveys to the city of Douglas, Wyoming, all right, title, and interest of the United States (as determined by the Secretary of the Interior) in land that: (1) was subject to a right-of-way that was granted to the predecessor of the Chicago and Northwestern Transportation Company and which right-of-way the Company has conveyed to the city; and (2) is located within the boundaries of the city or between the right-of-way of Interstate 25 and such city limits.

titles.title: A bill to relinquish any interest that the United States may have in certain land that was subject to a right-of-way that was granted to the predecessor of the Chicago and Northwestern Transportation Company, and for other purposes.
